name: Gem Smash
description:
Gem Smash is a matching game with a difference.

The large and colourful 10x10 grid allows for bigger matches and more strategic play. Match up to 9 gems to create one of the 5 special gems which can provide a big boost to your score.

6th May 2019 - Now with 3 selectable difficulty levels (Quick, Normal, Long) to suit your available play-time. As a rough guide, Quick is around 5 mins; Normal around 15 mins and Long can be 30 mins plus. (All totally random - your mileage may vary!)
